values:
lol ludacris is funny... yesterday was a crazy day... and it was... money... i'm totally going to skip over homecoming cuz some shit just has to be kept private... all i know is that their were many a more adventures down at the circle b ranch... but what happens at circle b stays at circle b, until monday when we can't help but tell everyone what kind of crazy shit was going down... 

the nigga adam was turning green, we didn't know what was going on, the ben police showed up, and jess had to go to the bathroom too... and that was just friday night... saturday will remain off of this lol... (what's that noise coming from the camper) and sunday was one of the best days ever... rollin' around with perry and josh in his new eclipse... we was doing some "double creepin" (that term is copyrighted lol) and rolling around like 4 fucking counties with Vin Diesel and some Flick Nazal.... crazy ass time... can you say 7th heaven? lol.... josh mickey and i rolled out to taco bell and the "park" yesterday and was a great time... wow... wow.... lol...

-mjh

Summer-Fall 04'- we all walked the scissors to pandora's box and we had us a peak inside.... When you walk the tight rope and your legs are made of scissors, sometimes you cut the thread. "You can't run from trouble, there ain't no place that far..."

you know what... live journal is really fucking stupid... i can't believe i was ever conned into getting one... it's basically a contest to see who can have the worst drama or who can have the most fun at any given time. it's such bullshit. i used to be the biggest drama whore in this thing and it like makes me sick... this thing is only for pity fiends and people who like to show off and make people jealous... so basically this is my last entry... it feels good to grow up... i think ben and i really will move to somewhere not in this god forsaken country... everyone wants to move to ny or la... but how typical is that? i don't know. i've been so weird lately. kind of realizing that as long as i'm in copley 1) my life will continue to suck 2) no one will try to help me 3)people will be lying hypocrites...  i've almost considered dropping my whole style because it really is not right to try and be hardcore in copley... it's impossible to be anything in copley... the gangsters and homies aren't real homies, the hicks aren't real hicks, the "goths" and "punks" are certianly not what they call themselves, and most of all the drug addict boo hoo my family life and existence is horrible cutter drug addict wanna be kurt cobain badasses are far from that... they're just rejects who desire for attention and need it 24/7 so whenever they're not around people that feel sorry for them they can get a livejournal and meet people all around the country (and world) to feel sorry for them too... =)

<marquee>"some stupid nirvana quote that changed my life..."</marquee>

good riddance... i leave tomorrow evening... not that anyone cares or will notice i'm gone. whatever... lately i've been breaking manson's golden rule. i've become content. not very many lows, not many highs. everything is just. ok... whatever. i'm a loser who does nothing but circulate himself around school. i don't really "hang out" with people who "understand" me or whatever. typical middle school problems... "no one understands me so i'm going to start wearing all black cuz it makes me feel more like myself..." this is all such a fucking joke.... and i have a new slogan by the way... Mike AdairEveryone in the world hates him, but he hates them back just the same... and there's the new stupid drama in my life... for a year, i have to sign all documents including school papers i sign "Michael Humbert Adair" so i can legally change my name... that's going to look appealing... ::sticks up middle fingers like slipknot does at their shows to look like "rebels":: by the way, why does every obsess over kurt cobain? it seems that everyone idolizes him but doesn't really have a reason except for "he's kurt cobain..." ::shrugs:: Nirvana is good none the less... "i don't know why i feel so tongue tyed..."

what the fuck is it with me and wiggers? three wiggers the past few days wanted to kick my ass... i got in a nice "confrontation" with some kid named keith cuz he bumped into me really hard cuz of his stupid wigger walk... other than that today was ok... lots of work to do. my step-dad problems are back again. but whatever. i have to go back to counseling. which fucking sucks... tomorrow i'm wearing a shirt i made that says "i eat cats" and on the back it says "and i hate sports..."

<marquee>"jesus don't want me for a sunbeam.."

i have a new song for my depression... 2+2=5 by radiohead... makes me very sad...

<marquee>"the lukewarm..."</marquee>

still very sick... the earache is gone but now my muscles are like rigor mortis and my throat is killing me... thanksgiving wasn't thanksgiving at all... just my mom my brother's and her bf... makes me wonder... i've never really had a family i've liked, or a stable one for that matter... but i know that isn't a very common complaint in this day and age... o well.. i had a dream about her last night... made me be in a sad mood... and i thought it was over... blarg. annie has been calling me a lot... her and i are kind of on the same plain now. she feels the hole that i do now. i have a feeling we're going to be shoulders for each other to lean on... we'll see how it goes... but none the less... it doesn't take the sting out of the memories...

<marquee>"how many times, did i warn you about jumping into the back of the cars?"</marquee>

stayed home from school today and didn't take my ap test... annie called me last night and was really sad about billy. apprently he has really fucking changed and they're probably going to break up... i feel bad... my ear hurts so fucking bad. i got the death bad... but i took some vicodin and all my problems melted away... addicted to the potion that drowns out my sorrows it's the new sun of my universe everything must revolve around it but i don't mind as long as clouds don't darken my skies and take my sunshine away... a slave to the weightlessness of its gravity its eyes are black holes taking me under but i don't mind... because i don't want to escape at least in its darkness i'm safe and calm i can sleep easily in its heavenly atmosphere in the black valley of my God... "we're accidents waiting to happen..."

The Singularity When you're out here everything seems so big so big and yet so very far away The distance makes the heart grow empty... When you're out here time slows down to a stop An eternity spent in infinity And on wonders why there's no end in sight... Out here in the heavens, everything is tranquil and placid just as you wished, you could of been all those years before... You are in the realm of the Gods themselves, yet you have an overwhelming feeling, that in this utopia you really, are nothing.... and that is all you have been... All alone wiht everyone around you.... "SiT Down, sTAND Up... Walk into the jaws of hell..."

today was great. yesterday we had fun at the play in our little crew but bethany was pissed at steve and ben so thus josh was mad at steve which meant more problems for the band... eek. not good. but today was amazing.... i bougt hail to the thief by radiohead... it isn't as good as i anticipated but still good... but band practice was sweet. josh showed up as a completely different person. his attitude was amazing. we talked for like 2 hours about fun stuff and serious stuff and were old pals again. then when we played we played great and added stuff to our songs and it's all good. hehe! so i'm in a good mood. even though i'm ugly as fuck.... i tried to dye the front of my  hair black and the back pink... let's just say it's not pink it's red and brown... and ugly...

<marquee>"(           )"</marquee>

yo yo... had a good weekend. friday was the football game and i had a good time actually. i didn't freeze to death. kevin had gotten hit by a car.  they had to call the cops and everything. kevin says he's thinking about sueing the guy who did it. wonderful controversy. so the marching band season is over, i'm kind of sad to see it go... o well. yesterday i spent the day at kevin's and then we went to the narcissus concert. he took bethany and i and we met seth josh steve and the whole crew up there. it was a good time. narcissus went on first actually which was weird and they only played like 5 songs.... o well. afterwards we went to swenson's and had a gay time. today julia, josh, abby, and sarah showed up at my house when i was very ugly looking. we talked in my driveway for awhile and joked around... then later i went driving for like 2 hours and i actually didn't hit anything... yay me...

i'm doing ok for once...

<marquee>"we build up our ladders with hopes of them falling.."</marquee>

hello... it has been an interesting couple of days. friday night was the football game. surprisingly i didn't die from the freezing cold. best moments of the night were josh's huge black hickey, mickey twirling the american flag like a guard girl, and making funny of dante when he got angry by saying "uh oh you better watch out for dante's anal inferno." saturday was good too. ben came over so we could do chemistry. we layed around and played guitar and then walked to subway talking about how america is trash and how we don't want to go to college in ohio. when we got back steve came over and we filmed some interesting shots for our project. after that it was band practice and ::gasp:: josh was actually present!!! we basically finished tale of october... just two more practices to smooth it out... yay.... this morning i woke up in a rather horny mood... had a lot of dreams of girls which is really pathetic and unusal... moof... mike is just really emo it seems.... o well.....

<marquee>"i pray you find, the piece you're looking for..."</marquee>
Mike Adair:goes through hell so you don't have to (my new slogan) "shoot here and the world gets smaller..."

this has been a rough couple days... the band didn't break up. we had our show on friday night, but it went kind of shaky and i got really upset because the one song i wanted to play really well for my dad (wherever he may be) we fucked up really bad... so the whole night was kind of a bummer... i went to bed feeling ok because at least marching band would do good at state so i could slave over my homework on sunday with a smile that we got a I... right? HELL NO! we traveled 3 hours on bus to columbus to do what? suck it up! hardcore! it wasn't like we got a II but were close. we were a solid two all the way... fuck! so now i'm really bummed... but whatever... i'm a nerd anyway...

<marquee>"let down and hanging around..."</marquee>

well... yeah... life fucking sucks. tomorrow is the worst day of the year for me and coincdently it's supposed to be the most celebrated and loved day of the year for all you "cool" boys and ghouls... the band situation gets fucking worse every second. don't expect "toth" or also known as "turbulence on the horizon" to be around much longer. i'm so angry at josh i want to fucking strangle. he says that as a band we are not going anywhere, which is fucking bullshit. two months ago when we sucked ass we got fucking invited to play lolla fucking palooza... most bands never even could begin to dream about that... and we haven't even been together a year... so fuck him. and he needs to quit taking his fucking angst at the world on me... so basically the one thing that's been keeping me stable through this shit, (the divorce, the move, the "break up") has been this band. one of the only reasons i can put up with how hard and stressful school is because i knew that on the weekend would be band practice and that i could get away and let it out by being productive... not to be stupid, but it looks like national "fuck mike" day again... so whatever... tomorrow i just feel like being dead cold... i mean like hardly talking to anyone and just being an emotional massochist. i figured that if life and the world want to fuck me over, i could partake in the slaughter as well... HAPPY HALLOWEEN! out... "do you want to feel pain, taking my name vain, caring never felt so lame inside, anybody else got pride, do you want to take my life?"

hello.
my life has been a bowl of shit these past two days. yesterday was cool until the afternoon. i had to ride all over the place with my brothers and i couldn't get my homework done. my mom explained to me that our van is broken so thus we can't go on the vacation we've been planning on for two years this winter and that christmas will be very shitty. i'm finally beginning to feel the effects of only having one parent. ::sigh:: also, i learned that my step-dad gave my little brothers beer... what the fuck? that's insane... then this morning i get to school feeling all depressed and shit and the whole day isn't very good. i forget to turn in this important paper didn't do so hot on a test etc. but also josh called me up and tells me i'm egotistical and make our band sound "good" when we really "suck." or whatever... fun fun fun... oh, and also the like 5 jocks and or homies that want to kick my ass...

<marquee>"something in the way... yeah..."</marquee>

hello... today was a stress ball dipped in hardships. i had the psat today. which took forever and was really hard. and on top of that i was bombarded with homework coming out of everywhere. i was like a day behind. also i have to practice for my symphonic music test etc. moof. so much shit going on. other than that it was a bland day like always... i feel so "fitter happier ish right now..." minus the fit and minus the happy. shit! that sucks. i'm trying to think of something interesting to say. i'm going to a haunted house on saturday and everyone is invited. brittany says it has to be some huge friends thing. so yeah. we'll see how that goes. and this month is the anti-shit for me as some of you may know...... so mentally i'm not doing so good. o, and i'll give a great sexual favor to the first person who can run out and purchase me a decent pair of headphones...

<marquee>"...concerned... but powerless..."</marquee>

hello... very stressed out but happy. i have a huge paper for ap euro due tomorrow and i only have one paragraph... eeps... last night was the brunswick competition. a lot of fun. we actually got 2nd which was amazing. sitting in the stands was great fun. it was me, michelle, ben, brittany, sarah, kevin, curtis, mickey, josh, and bethany... the whole crew... all snuggling to keep warm... how cute..
also, one of our assistant band directors mr. donafrio is in a really heavy metal band, and he invited us to play with his band for a whole bunch of people in december... this shall be a lot of fun...

by the way... stabat matter is the most incredible piece of music ever written... even if it is about jesus...

<marquee>"...Disconnect and self destruct one woman at a time
What's your rush now, everyone will have his day to die..."</marquee>

hello... my step-dad once again proved he was a total lunatic. he told my little brothers that my real father died of a crack overdose. if he would of said that to me... yeah... we're not going to get into that... in other news, a whole bunch of jocks want to kick my ass, like logan jennings. and apparently i eat cats again too. logan is dressing up as me for halloween. so me and all the crew are dressing up as either dead or gay football or soccer players... except for curtis who is going as a little black kid...

<marquee>"she's got everything i need..."</marquee>

hello... why is there so much badness in the air? it's crazy! all my friends are like in dire peril. my life has stabled out, but it's just very boring... and i wish i had a significant other... o well... by the way thanks abby and sarah for a good time... dane cook rules!

<marquee>"...just leave your sympathy, hanging out the 15th floor..."</marquee>

Tale of October our love is like the autumn leaves dead but beautiful on the outside i've seen you change but with in me you remain the same why did they take you away from me united we stood and one by one we fall... like the october leaves dead but beautiful... "this love, never grows tired, and always inspired, by you..."

hello... was really sad on friday night cuz i keep getting my friend michelle in trouble cuz her mom is an uptight nazi and thinks i'm satan so she gets in trouble for being seen with me... but today was fun. annie came over and we talked for an hour about religion... it was weird. when she came back to my house we went into my club house thing in my back yard. it was funny cuz she found a playboy that i didn't even know about... lol... also she said that all she wanted to do was bake out the club house and she said it would be perfect... mmm. interesting. but the big newz of the day is the arrival of my grandparents. i haven't seen them since november. it feels good to see them. they left in the beginning of the divorce drama. so it really sucked. today at marching band we qualified for state. yipee. was really scary. i thought we sucked... o... and i made a promise to myself, no more smoking and no more flirting.... i'm really lonely, but flirting with everyone is just not me....

<marquee>"and all the children are insane, waiting for the summer rain..."</marquee>

haven't updated in awhile... very sad since yesterday. court tomorrow for the whole divorce thing. but whatever. i don't feel like updating much anymore. i don't have much of a life. i don't do anything anymore except sit in front of this computer and pray someone interesting signs online... me=pathetic... but aside from that, everyone should join the NAAWP, we're not a rascist organization, just we believe in eliminating stupid shit like affirmative action. by the way... tool is still a good band and radiohead chords are hard to play on guitar when you suck at barring off frets on an acoustic... ;l our love is like the autumn leaves, dead but beautiful.... "i'm breathing so i guess i'm still alive... even though signs seem to tell me other wise..."

hello... just got back from band competition and it's fucking 1 in the morning... rar... the bus ride home was very depressing. not only because we didn't do so well. i feel so trapped lately. locked within myself. someone be the key... again... if i could hold you in my dreams one more time then i would most certainly open my eyes if you promised me the truth then i would turn it into lies if outside your sun was shining then i would make it rain if i could feel your soothing touch i would make myself feel pain if i could hold you in my dreams one more time then i would most certainly open my eyes for i would much rather be awake than to dream of pretty lies... "leave here... we'll start something new in our loving embrace... with what crashes your parts into mine..."

homecoming wasn't so bad. i didn't totally freak out like expected, i was able to hold the tears in. a bigger update after the show tomorrow right now i'm "chillin'" with mickie and having a good time...

<marquee>"the more you change the less you feel believe in me as i believe in you tonight..."</marquee>

this has been one hell of a hectic week. i still don't know what's going on with homecoming tonight. o well. also things with the band are really screwy. apparently josh wanted to try out joel yesterday, but he didn't tell steve and once steve found out he showed up and was going to kick all of our asses. he blew up on us and we all talked about how everyone has such a lack of communication lately. and speaking of josh, bethany and i are sooooo fucking worried about him. he is stressed out to the limit. he's going to break down very soon. and he doesn't talk to anyone about his problems anymore and he has a lot of stuff going on with him right now. he apparently said a lot of shit about me behind my back about how when he and bethany were semi-broken up i hit on her like crazy without his permission, and that i always do stuff like that and i only think about myself. which really fucking hurt, cuz i was beginning to trust josh like an older brother that i never had type of thing. i told bethany about and she said to ignore him because he was talking dillusional and that's not how he really feels. but i dunno. he called me up this morning and was really happy because he finally got some good sleep and he was looking forward to picking steve and i up so we could chill at seth's house and write our new song "midnight visions." (written about someone) and he was sooo happy as i stressed before, and right as we got off the phone he called me back really upset and cold sounding saying "i can't come and i gotta go bye..." this makes me even more stressed out cuz i don't know what's going on and we have a show tomorrow and we haven't ran through our songs in quite some time... arrgghhh!! but whatever... this just really sucks... Midnight Visions in the dark these eyes can see forever the world comes in focus your face flashes blue metamorphic ideas of a somatic philosophy time doesn't pass when i'm thinkning of you the thoughts blend into a memory mosaic nothing decays... no one leaves... nobody dies... if only dreams weren't such liars... "how many times have you awoken in a strangers arms covered in gasoline as they hover over you with the match they're about to ignite..."

i forgot how good narcissus is. i just downloaded a song off their new album and it's fucking sweet. but aside from that. this has been an awkward weekend so far. last night at the football was bad. i just felt like shit for some reason. it got better though. i found this freshmen boy who i hugged in the hall during the school day and said "i love freshmen boys" and i stuck my trombone in his ass. then i spent the rest of the night chasing him. he was so scared i was going to rape him. it was hillarious. the bus ride home was interesting as well. i made out with some girl named megan because all these people were daring me too. she's not ugly. just really ditzy. and a slut. she couldn't kiss though. i did all the fucking work she didn't do anything... o well. when we got back to the school i put on nin in our stereo and got all sad because i felt really alone and i felt like everything was fake etc. everyone around me was feeling bad too like bethany and josh, especailly kaylie. kaylie's adult friend is dying and she is really bummed. i felt bad... so i gave her a kiss goodbye.... then when i got home i wrote something for the first time in over a month. it's not too good. then i got all sad and played "the funeral march" on guitar for a long time and went to sleep. today was a long day as well. i sat around and played guitar and redyed my hair. when band pracitce time arrived it kicked ass. we redid the band room and now there's all this room and there's carpet. we played very well for not having played in two weeks. after we practiced we picked up britney and bethany and went out and had a great time at taco bell. after that we played for britney for she missed out on our show. which reminds me. we have another show sunday september 21st at the voodoo. at 7 o clock... everyone has to be there on time... muahha. more details later... Utopia i can close my eyes and create my world of disguise ...utopia... i'm the tears that don't come forth ...evaporating without worth... i'm the puzzle piece that didn't quite fit ...unable to fill the niche... i'm the star that burned out in your eyes. ...not a glitter of hope in my skies... i'll convince myself everything's ok ...as my entire world falls away... i can repeat the sin, the wrong, the lie ...but there are somethings i can't deny... i can no longer ignore what's right in front of me anymore ...utopia... "they told you you'll die soon, and there's no hope for this one... just let him go..."

hello. had a stresful day. i got called down to borchiks office and he gave me a bus card. then my mom found out and got in mr. n's face and is saying that she is going to get in the face of mr. borchick so i'll have to answer to them both tomorrow... i feel really weird right now. like i'm stuck in a dream... it's all fucked up. i don't feel like i used to. i'm empty, but i'm too tired to care... concerned, but powerles... ::sigh:: this is so annoying...

<marquee>"...flower in full foul nectar, space between a blink and a tear... death blooms..."</marquee>

::sigh:: i'm going to die tomorrow... i have a huge ap euro test first thing in the morning... i've been studying for an hour and i'm not even half way through the material... and i'm listening to squarepusher... and reflecting... on how good everything was around this time last year... and all the fun times i had while listening to this cd. why does everything fade so quickly?

<marquee>"...remember when you were young? you shown like the sun..?"</marquee>

today was actually a decent day. i didnt' get called down to the office today which is a plus. i guess all the drama from friday night just kind of faded.  the highlight of the day was getting to see mr. green. after school i rode my bike up the street to the middle school to visit him. we had the best time catching up on everything. he informed me that he didn't go to our show because he said that if he and his "boys" would of rolled up into the voodoo (the bar) they would of  been drinking and smoking like crazy and he said certain kids from the school district would tell on him. lol. but yeah, he explained to me his tattoo and that he barel plays his guitar anymore which is sad. steve showed up and the three of us had a nice chat about howo cool of a guy he was. mr. g also informed me that he is trying to get into administration which is fucking sweet. in like 5 years if mr. g was the principal, i would so totally fail college to be back in middle school with him... muahaha... but yeah. once i got home nothing too grand happened except just now i went upstairs and puked in the sink.... but the sick thing was that it was black... i don't think that's a good sign. i mean my health has been secretly deteriorating, but yeah, i wasn't expecting that... o well, off to bed so i can go to school and learn about the boring ass Renaissance first thing in the morning....

<marquee>"...i'd tell all my friends but they'd never believe me, they'd think that i had finally lost it completely..."</marquee>

...don't expect me to DIE....for this... listening to nirvana for the first time in a long time. i'm trying not to get choked up... "...you broke my heart, but i have some glue, help me inhale, and mend it with you..."

today was awesome... i got me some pink hair now muahah! makes me happy. the whole gang except sarah sadly went out to the movies for i was denied going to elicia's due to my mom's freakish work schedule. abby picked me up, and we went up to amc to meet just kaylie, steve's x girlfriend who i randomly made out with last night... lol. but. she wasn't showing up. then steve and seth randomly showed up. so we were like "ok." then, steve and i went to abby's car and randomly running out of nowhere was bethany of all people. she said we had to run to regal to go pick up kaylie. so we did. twas a lot of fun. then kevin and curtis eventually showed up. so after joking and watching the movie, we all chilled in the parking lot. this guy almost hit me, so kevin flipped him off, so the guy turned around to get out of his car and yell at me for everything. it was fucked up. so abby got his license plate. twas fun... eventually we dropped bethany off at home and i gave her a big hug. she needs it. i feel so bad for her. something really bad is happening to her tomorrow that doesn't need to be mentioned, i just hope i can help her since josh has to work all day... moof... but yeah. hopefully tomorrow goes ok...

<marquee>"...this may hurt a little but it's something you can get used to..."</marquee>

fuck marching band! fuck *****! fuck *****! fuck everyone! fuck mr. neidlinger! fuck the crazy ass old hag of a fucking bus driver! fuck ryan kepis! even though he did nothing wrong to me! he just creeps me out! fuck fate for being such a cocksucker! fuck me for having no talents! fuck me for being absolutely hateable! and fuck god! fuck him in his deaf and useless ear canal! i'm fucking tired of being taken advantage of! i'm fucking sick of being over looked or taken too seriously! i'm fucking tired of not fitting! i'm fucking tired of everyone lying to me all the time! and then denying it by saying shit like "not all promises can be kept!" what kind of fucked up shit is that! i'm tired of being "concerned yet powerless!" and fucking everyone who has ever left me! i'm just sick and tired of being sick and tired. call me whatever the fuck you want, just say it to my fucking face, besides, seeing how much it hurts me is half the fucking fun right? take your best fucking shot! i don't care... i just don't fucking care. if anyone wants to kick the fucking shit out of me, go ahead. i don't care. it's not like anyone would help anyway, they'd just join in. i know that's what everyone wants is to see me on the ground with people stomping on me, you don't have to wish anymore, just do it... i'm tired of being talked about behind my back. why the fuck am i so hated when all i try to do is help people...? fuck that. how many times can i say "fuck" in a lj entry? i don't know! let's find out... fuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuck!

thanks kayly for the kiss by the way. you made my evening...
<marquee>"....fuck it all, fuck this world, fuck everything that you stand for, don't belong, don't exist, dont' give a shit, don't ever judge me..."</marquee>

today was very stressful and demoralizing at school. it was a long day and like usual i didn't see anyone in the halls i like... i have the most fucked up schedule... but yeah... so much homework and stress. and when i got home there was nothing but more badness. my step-dad is doing even more crazy shit which is really frustrating. but o well, it's not like anyone gives a shit anyway... but. after awhile some goodness happened. sarah called from abby's car as i was stark naked in the shower. she hollered at me to get dressed and rush out to see them. after showing sarah my new house we went driving and had a gay old time flicking off a certain someone's house and rolling in the ghetto while listening to bush. they're my new crew.. muahaa... hopefully things continue to get better..

<marquee>"...this may hurt a little but it's something you can get used to..."</marquee>

i'm really lost on what to do with myself. i had a bad thought today in school. i'm taking hard classes because i want to be able to get scholarships to iowa etc etc. but. no one i know is going to iowa. i'll have no friends and i won't meet anyone in iowa. i'm worried that i'd actually be alone after highschool, for good, even after what everyone has said... what everyone has promised... i just wish my true calling would kick me in the ass... lights of infinity dazzle the night time sky eternal flames burn bright and we may never know why ...it's solar... the journey to heaven billions of souls astray left alone for their sins space, where lives are thrown away... ...it's solar... celestial bodies lives left out in the cold drifiting through tubes of time where spectres grow weary and old ...it's solar... "stick to the side roads... they help... interesting thought... you see what you want to se..."

hello... i haven't updated in awhile. things have been up and down like always... a brief summary is that abby and i had a fun day the other driving around and getting applications to arabica. but, i learned that my step-dad is starting some really disturbing and SICK and i mean truly INSANE stuff. one of his acts involves murdering a kitten and throwing it in our bushes. but aside from that. other things have came about. like the show. as many of you know our first show was last night. it was a fucked up day that's for sure. we got to the voodoo late so we thought it would be crowded with other bands, thus we wouldn't be playing. however, when we got there there was just one other band, and it was their first show. they were crazy ass guyz in their twenties, really nice and hopsitable though. they went on first. i beleive they were called "thank god it isn't van halen," which is a creative name, but yeah very weird. their set wasn't bad. good guitar playing. their drummer and vocalist sucked sadly. o well. not bad for a first performance. by then a whole lot of our friends were showing up. when it was time for us to take the stage, we were all very nervous and unsure about how to set up the stage. we had so much fucking equipment lol. twice as much as the other band. when it was time for sound check disaster struck, the tube amp wasn't working. luckily the sound check guy was really nice and was patient enough to discover the chord was blown. he gave us a spare and we were ready to rock! muahaha. our first three songs went over really well, much better than expected. and by then we had at least 30 people just for us which was really cool. then we tried the cover of nin's "something i can never have." i didn't sing it, but i screamed on back up for the chorus'. poor josh sang it, and he learned the whole song in two days. steve also played a ghetto ass keyboard through a shitty amp so it didn't sound too great. the audience seemed to enjoy it, but said that josh singing it was kind of annoying. after that we played our instrumental song, but i fucked up really bad. the guitar was out of tune pretty bad, so i just had to play through it... steve's solo was also pretty out of key as well. we had mixed reactions to that song. people said it was good minus the solo, and other people were indifferent. we closed with "eternal youth" which went over really really well and people really liked the song. after the show we all went out to eat at stake n shake with like a billion people. all good times. when i got home, kevin and ben stayed over which was an interesting time. ben apparently got some cigs from various people however due to him wanting to be a supid addict he smoked all but one. kevin told him to light it up but we couldn't find a lighter. once i found my lighter we all smoked it. it was really funny cuz ben would suck in really deep, but he wasn't really "inhaling" (similar to some other people i know of hahaha) so we told him too, and he coughed so hard and got really light headed. he literally paniced to the point where he thought he was dying. it was funny. after that kevin and i finished it and we all fell asleep after a fun and crazy night... "...you're turning into something you're not..."

i fucking hate school... i just feel this aura of hatred directed toward me secretly.... o well. i have a ton of homework for this weekend. which is going to be stressful. however the only fun part of the day was that we passed out all kinds of fucking flyers for the show.. thanks to justin for making them for us. it would be really funny if somehow like 100 people showed up on sunday just to see us. everyone better be there. in other newz... my dreams have been really fucked up lately. and lately i have had a very hard time breathing which is really scary, but my mom doesn't believe me..i think i have "random julia can't breahte syndome" or more commonly known as RJCBS. and lately i've been feeling rather "oedipus" like. i feel like i'm not an asshole to most people, and i always do my best to "check up" on my friends and make sure they're ok... but yet i feel like i don't get much in turn. like i've said, i think that if one of my friends killed themselves i would get very distraut for quite sometime.. but i feel i don't really have a terribly "close" relationship with anyone anymore... so yeah... i don't know. i used to mean everything to someone, but now i mean nothing to just about everyone.... "...and we said... till we die..."
fuck everyone who has ever lied to me or hurt me.... "this is what you should fear... you are what you should fear..."

today was the first day of school. it feels good being a sophmore, but school gives me this overwhelming emptiness, almost as bad as when i'm alone... i have my college class first thing in the morning which is horrible, and all my "hard" classes are in the afternoon all right after another. my schedule sucks but who cares anyway it's my fault for picking those classes... i have no classes with "friends" except for my friend ben who has almost the same schedule as me... blah blah blah. whine whine whine... o well. the best part of the day was that i wore my radiohead shirt that i love so much, and it's so soft and comfy. well. i have to go... i have to memorize every country in europe for a test tomorrow as well as every era since the birth of christ in chronological order...

<marquee>"...she's got the blood of reptile under her skin..."</marquee>

hello. today was awkward, had a good band practice in preparation for the show, until bethany showed up, josh's ex gf who he adores still and who still adores him. it was her birthday so i gave her the cds i burned her... but. once she showed up we couldn't focus at finishing practice, and josh just wanted to show off and showever her in attention... it really pissed me off... but o well.. after she left, seth josh steve and i watched "waking life" it wasn't a bad movie. i just laughed cuz seth thinks it's the most amazing thing ever, when half of that movie i had thought of before... lol... it was great. after that, seth josh and i tbrough apples at shit.. it was fun...

yesterday was fucked up. we were supposed to play at a block party, but the other band got scared that they would get upstaged by us so they refused to let us use their equipment, so we bailed. instead we practiced for a while, and wrote "turbulence on the horizon" the song... it's ghetto, but, coming along.  after that we went to the voodoo... to watch david's band. what was amzing was that they were opening for dolly trauma! dolly trauma! whhehee! but... of course... as my life goes, the night was bad. david invited me onstage to sing a medely of hendrix songs.. he said i would sing purple haze and he would sing hey joe.. which was cool... instead, he began with hey joe, and i freaked, cuz he wasn't singing... so it tired to pull it off, but i was really out of key, and it didn't help that there was no vocal monitor in front of me! david saved me by going into a nice guitar solo.. when he began to play purple haze, the first verse and chorus went ok, and people shaked off the fact that i butchered hey joe, but, when the second verse came, he messed up the words, and i didn't, so everyone thought i was crazy again... after fumbling through the rest of the song... i got off stage embarassed as hell... everyone said i did ok for not playing that style of music etc, they just wish i knew the words better... but one guy said i was the worst thing he had ever seen... muahhaa... great. and i didn't get to see dolly trauma cuz seth's mom made us leave.  poop. today i'm doing homework all day and tomorrow is band practice all day in preparation for the voodoo. everyone better be there...

in other newz, i've been working on my room, putting up black light paint and those glow in the dark stars... spooky. hehe. can't wait to get black curtains hehe...

<marquee>"...ain't no hang man gonna put a rope around me..."</marquee>

last night was radiohead. it was rather interesting. got there with annie and imideatly met up with ben, and soon after julia, david, sarah, elicia, and athena... as we talked for awhile julia dragged her party away to find her dad and annie ben and i went to go look at the shops. after complimenting a goth boy on his nin shirt, annie lit up a cigarette, like always... ben got really curious and all hyper and bent on having to have a cigarrette... annie said "don't pass it to mike" lol, because she doesn't want me doing it, but ben didn't hear and i took a few hits... it was no big deal. i feel bad for being all over kevin now back when he smoked, cuz it was nothing. it was rather funny cuz the whole night, annie would light up a cig, smoke it, throw it, and then ben would run after it and smoke it to the filter.. it was hillarious. ben is like hooked. after that we all sat around and talked about 8th grade and how much better it was than freshmen year and annie told us some intersting stories about her past and how everyone "fucked up" around here is just following annie. and she told us some very interesting stories about some other people... by then radiohead was about to take the stage so we took ben to the lawn, and annie and i went to the pavillion. i was really pissed off for the first few songs because annie's mom and her sister were flat drunk and they kept buggin me and asking me dumb questions and hugging me and shit... when they played the song "lucky" i almost started crying, but i didn't want to make a scene in front of annie's mom... as radiohead played on i got to thinking about all the shit that has happened in my life and in this summer, and how things should be, how they should of been etc etc... and then they played "paranoid android" and i balled my head off while screaming the words as loud as i could... the same thing happened when they played "exit music(for a film)." i was a mess... annie tried to comfort me because she could see that i was really worked up, but there was nothing she could do to make me feel better... and then the worst part of the night, during no surprises, annie's drunk ass mom says "we have to go..." annie could tell i wouldn't budge so she said that we could meet up with them... as "no surprises" dwindled down, annie literally had to rip me by my arm to get me to start moving toward the exit of the pavillion.  of course, the ending chord had to end just as i set foot outside, and i began to bawl once again... i was crying so hard that i couldn't speak.... i felt bad for annie to have to drag me out of there last night.  as we were reaching the exit of blossom i could here the ending chords of "the bends" fading away in the background. and i got really choked up. i bet they played for another half hour, and they were great, but naturally, i couldn't see it. so. i hope, those of you who saw it, had a good time...

</marquee>"hungry? sick? begging for a break? sweet? fresh? strung up by the wrists? WE SUCK THE YOUNG BLOOD..."</marquee>

i've giving up on being happy.... you all win... i didn't die at radiohead, but i sure wish i was dead... there's nothing left to be excited for...

yesterday was really good. it had been a long time since i had such a good day. i was planning to spend the whole day sitting in front of my computer doing homework and being sad, until josh called. josh had the bright idea that out of nowhere he was going to have a pool party at his house. one thing led to another and mike mcgregor who is this incredibly cool and funny senior showed up at my house to take me up there. he's one of those half wigger, half just plain kids and we hopped into his car that he pimped out with neon lights and a fast engine and all of that shit, and we hit the freeway. since he races his car with the thugs in akron, we topped out on the interstate at about 110. it was fucking scary, but a lot of fun.  when we arrived at josh, josh said like no one was invited lol... it ended up being me, josh, mike mcgregor, a junior named tim muir, and josh's ex girlfriend bethany. so we go down to the pool and there was nothign but old fat people doing calisthetics... it was so fucking disgusting. lol. we drove the old people out of the pool by talking loudly about gynecology and things. it was really gross cuz the pool water didn't taste like chlorine, but salt. so everyone said it tasted like semen. as the party dwindled and tim left, mike said he had to go to work at regal, so he invited josh and i to go see a movie. we agreed. once he left, josh drove bethany to a bday party, but first we drove her to wal mart. josh and i almost repeatedly got kicked out for i had a bright pink fishnet shirt on with nothing over it or under it. we then went to the toy aisle and started playing basketball and some old guy yelled at us... after that i grabbed a football and screamed "sports" and said "josh, go long duuuuudddeee," and he did. he caught the ball and surprisingly spiked it really fucking hard and it flew up and hit like a million shelves. after being banned from the toy department, we moved to the car stereo area and cranked up all the systems.. we got repremanded for that as well.  last but not least, after playing with thongs and bras for a good half hour, we took bethany to her party.  then josh and i drove to seth's picked him up, and floored it to taco bell. it was great getting called gay by a million people for wearing my shirt. and what surprise awaited us at taco bell? mike mcgregor! he was there on his break. so he told us to go the the movies. after we got our food, seth josh and i floored it back to seth's and practiced for a little bit. by then it was 9:30 so we floored it to the movie theatre. we realized that the only things playing were rated r, and we had no money. mike mcgregor saw us and was just like, "go on and walk in, we here at regal entertainment group don't give a shit..." we saw "swimming pool" which was the dumbest softcore porn ever. lol. seth covered his eyes during the sex scenes too. pussy muahahaa... once the movie ended, andrew toppin, another marching  band senior, and mcgregor were planning to do something to the marching band field. apparently, the had a trashbag full of popcorn covered in urine, and then i see josh and mike mcgregor running out of the theatre with a huge cardboard display for the movie "the medallion." i ran into the parking lot with seth to watch them stuff it in andy's truck... i hopped with mcgregor and we floored it to the highschool. we dumped the popcorn all over the marching field, and propped the display up on mr. n's tower... it was great to do something illegal. this morning, there was geese shit all over the field from the gesse eating the urine popcorn... hehee.. it was great to watch 200+ people walk home with shit shoes... muahaha...

<marquee>"happiness is not having to lie on the floor dead and alone..."</marquee>

hello. today was the show at seth's house. it was very interesting. full of complications and badness... of course. but we played, and had a good time. i'm not sure if the audience had a good time, but o well. saw julia and sarah for the first time in a long time. that was nice. then my parents gave me a huge rant about how they think i'm suicidal... i don't know if i am truly or not. i mean, i don't like my life right now or myself, but doing anything drastic as far as drugs or cutting or any of that dumb shit is totally retarded. so basically i just sit here.  i don't know who i am anymore really. i just live. cuz i guess that's all i can really do.  many people say that all i do is point the blame and beat around the bush, i avoid my problems. and other people say i worry about my problems too much and need to let go... i just know that there is only one person in this world who ever made everything make complete sense. and that person still does it. i thank them for it..... i just feel so alone all the time and i don't know why. i wish i would hear from valary. i don't like her too much or anything, but she's nice and fun to talk to. i want her to move in with me. just so i would always have someone around. i know i'm just ranting... and this entire entry makes no sense. i'm sorry... i'm off to kill myself at radiohead i guess.

<marquee>"...it didn't turn out the way you wanted it to, it didn't turn out quite the way that you wanted it did it...now... you know... this is what it feels like..."</marquee>

the other day wasn't too bad... in the day time. i got see eric panzner for the first time in a long time. and probably the last... ever... =(... the kid was so fucking cool. he gave me a copy of his cd that he made. he's a strange kid. he released his first cd when he was a freshmen. and i have one of the only 100 copies. muahhaa. but his new cd under his new name "zain issac" entitled "learn to sleep well and rest your weary eyes," is so fucking good. it sounds like a great blend of radiohead, coldplay, and your favorite acoustic guitar songs. i'm just so envious of this kid. he's like the trent reznor of the indie rock scene, on the cd he plays every instrument. drums, guitar, bass, piano, sings, even play banjo. it's so fucking insane. but yeah. then the blackout hit and i wanted to die. there's all kinds of shit going on with my family that i'm paranoid about and stuff. as well as various other elements/people that are making me really sad and stressed out. and i felt like shit so i snuggled in the dark with juliaz blanket and cried like the lead singer of dashboard confessional.  when the power came back i needed to talk to someone and then remembered that i couldn't call elicia. eric was still at work so i couldn't call him and i knew annie wasn't home. i called juliaz cell phone but she didn't pick up. so i fell asleep. this morning i was really pissed off cuz my mom threw away my eyeliner as well as annie's fucking eyeliner sharpener.  i'm angry at so many things. tis really shitty. but. of course i had marching band. today was so fucking hot i thought i was going to die.  however, i've been occupying my song to learning the solo to "the beauty and the beast" theme song. muahaha. it's so stupid and i'm a loser. but it keeps me occupied....
